briefTitle: Impact of Community Scabies Treatment on Head Lice Prevalence in the Solomon Islands

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All participants living in the community will be offered treatment

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with a contradindication to study medication
* Patients unable to provide consent

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Headlice
outcomeMeasures.description: Assessed in the study population by physical examination of hair
